attributes.action: prevent the use of evolutionist and other pseudo-scientific propaganda in Government-funded schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Evolution is a religious idea without any scientific backing. All the measurable, checkable, rational evidence points to a recent special creation of the earth. It is wrong for such to be taught as fact. It is worth examining to show how easily people can be fooled by phrases like "all scientists say."

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
